item.title: Xbox Partner Preview live stream set for November 20
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

007 First Light, Tides of Annihilation, REANIMAL, and more.

Microsoft Gaming will host an Xbox Partner Preview live stream on November 20 at 10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 pm. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (Audio Description, ASL) and Twitch.

The broadcast will feature news on upcoming games from third-party partners, including a first look at content coming to 007 First Light, an extended gameplay trailer for Tides of Annihilation, and a new look at REANIMAL, as well as other titlesâ€”including new reveals and Game Pass announcements. All of the games featured in the broadcast are Xbox Play Anywhere titles. The show will be narrated by Jennifer English, who portrays Tides of Annihilation protagonist Gwendolyn.

Stay tuned.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/xbox-partner-preview-live-stream-set-for-november-20
